description: A simple example of a package

metadata.label: Flow
metadata.description: Flow control nodes

metadata.label: Branch
metadata.description: Branching nodes

metadata.label: If
metadata.description: Add conditional branch to the integration flow.

metadata.label: Iteration
metadata.description: Iteration nodes

metadata.label: While
metadata.description: Loop over a block of code.

metadata.label: Foreach
metadata.description: Iterate over a block of code.

metadata.label: Break
metadata.description: Exit the current loop

metadata.label: Continue
metadata.description: Skip the current iteration and continue with the next one

metadata.label: Control
metadata.description: Control nodes

metadata.label: Stop
metadata.description: Stop the flow

metadata.label: Data
metadata.description: Data nodes are used to create, read, update, delete, and transform data

metadata.label: Error Handling
metadata.description: Handle errors that occur during execution

metadata.label: ErrorHandler
metadata.description: Catch and handle errors

metadata.label: Panic
metadata.description: Panic and stop the execution

metadata.label: Concurrency
metadata.description: Concurrency nodes

metadata.label: Transaction
metadata.description: Handle transaction.

metadata.label: Lock
metadata.description: Allow to access mutable states safely

metadata.label: Start
metadata.description: Execute a function or a method invocation in a new strand

metadata.label: printInfo
metadata.description:
Prints info logs.
```ballerina
log:printInfo("info message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: printError
printWarn
metadata.description:
Prints warn logs.
```ballerina
log:printWarn("warn message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: printDebug
metadata.description:
Prints debug logs.
```ballerina
log:printDebug("debug message", id = 845315)
```

metadata.label: toJson
metadata.description: Converts a value of type `anydata` to `json`.

metadata.label: toXml
metadata.description:
Converts a `Map` or `Record` representation to its XML representation.
Additionally, when converting from a record, the `xmldata:Namespace`, `xmldata:Name`, and `xmldata:Attribute`
annotations can be used to add `namespaces`, `name of elements`, and `attributes` to XML representation.

metadata.label: parseAsType
metadata.description: Convert value of type `json` to subtype of `anydata`.

metadata.label: parseAsType
metadata.description: Converts XML to record type with projection.

metadata.label: read
metadata.description:
Extract details from the given JSON value using the provided query template expression.

```ballerina
read({id: 1, "name": "John Doe"}, `$.name`) => "John Doe"
```

metadata.label: prettify
metadata.description: Prettifies a `json` value to print it.

metadata.label: transform
metadata.description:
Transforms the single-rooted XML content to another XML/HTML/plain text using XSL transformations.
```ballerina
xml|error target = xslt:transform(sourceXml, xsl);
```

metadata.label: fileReadCsv
fileReadJson
metadata.description:
Reads file content as a JSON.
```ballerina
json|io:Error content = io:fileReadJson("./resources/myfile.json");
```

metadata.label: fileReadBytes
metadata.description:
Read the entire file content as a byte array.
```ballerina
byte[]|io:Error content = io:fileReadBytes("./resources/myfile.txt");
```

metadata.label: fileReadXml
metadata.description:
Reads file content as an XML.
```ballerina
xml|io:Error content = io:fileReadXml("./resources/myfile.xml");
```

metadata.label: fileWriteCsv
fileWriteJson
fileWriteBytes
fileWriteXml
